biocontainers.name: nextflow
biocontainers.summary: A dsl for data-driven computational pipelines http://nextflow.io

biotools.summary: Nextflow enables scalable and reproducible scientific workflows using software containers. It allows the adaptation of pipelines written in the most common scripting languages.

bioschemas.name: Nextflow
bioschemas.summary: Nextflow enables scalable and reproducible scientific workflows using software containers. It allows the adaptation of pipelines written in the most common scripting languages.
